## Problem 1: NYC Transit Data

```{r read and clean}
library(tidyverse)
transit_df = read_csv("./Data/subway_data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(line:entry, vending, ada)%>%
  mutate(entry = recode(entry, YES = TRUE, NO = FALSE)) 

head(transit_df, 10)
```
